for the love of god, do not play this game. odds are you already have and are just looking for funny comments. This ISNT one of those, sorry buddy. you play a little and ur like "yeah this is pretty fun" then u start playing with friends and all your friends want to play this game so you end up playing a lot but you get mad all the time cause you're terrible at the game and its a waste of time but you end up spending money on cases and skins anyway because "eh i play the game so much anyway" and BAM five years youll never get back and i cant stop send help

good luck, im sure you're already downloading or hopping into a match now.

Here's how it is probably going to go down:
If you place in Silver, you might as well get another copy because you will most likely not be able to get out of it.  Here's why: if you are trying to get out of Silver, enemies will report you for being too good so then you're basically going to face other low trust people and then you're screwed.

Otherwise this game good.
